mapper.select:
/* schedule.getTeamMember */
SELECT USER_ID ,GET_USER_NM(USER_ID) AS USER_NM FROM TBL_EXP_TEAM_MEMBER A JOIN (SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,TEAM_ID FROM TBL_EXP_TEAM_MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} AND ROWNUM < 2 ) B ON 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = B.SP_CSTM_ID AND A.TEAM_ID = B.TEAM_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID != #{sessionVo.userId}

/* schedule.scheduleDuplicationCheck */ WITH SCHEDULE AS ( SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')||LPAD(START_TIME_HOUR, 2, '0')||':'||START_TIME_MINUTE||':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE ,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD')||LPAD(END_TIME_HOUR, 2, '0')||':'||END_TIME_MINUTE||':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} AND SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE ) SELECT SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE ,SCHEDULE.START_DATE ,SCHEDULE.END_DATE FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_DATE ,TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE FROM DUAL ) CHECK_DATA ,SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( CHECK_DATA.START_DATE BETWEEN SCHEDULE.START_DATE AND SCHEDULE.END_DATE OR CHECK_DATA.END_DATE BETWEEN SCHEDULE.START_DATE AND SCHEDULE.END_DATE ) OR ( SCHEDULE.START_DATE BETWEEN CHECK_DATA.START_DATE AND CHECK_DATA.END_DATE OR SCHEDULE.END_DATE BETWEEN CHECK_DATA.START_DATE AND CHECK_DATA.END_DATE ) ORDER BY SCHEDULE.START_DATE

/* schedule.getScheduleMasterList */ SELECT SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_MASTER A WHERE 1 = 1
AND SCHEDULE_GRP_ID = #{scheduleGrpId}
mapper.insert: /* schedule.insertSchedule */ INSERT INTO TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE ( SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,TIME_TYPE ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID ,CREATE_USER ,CREATE_DATE ) VALUES( #{sessionVo.spCstmId} ,#{scheduleId} ,#{scheduleGrpId} ,#{loopType} ,#{loopTypeDtlCd} ,#{loopTypeDtlVal} ,(TO_DATE(#{loopLimitDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ,#{title} ,#{workType} ,#{allApplyYn} ,#{timeType} ,(TO_DATE(#{scheduleStartDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ,#{startTimeH} ,#{startTimeM} ,(TO_DATE(#{scheduleEndDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ,#{endTimeH} ,#{startTimeM} ,#{contractId} ,#{position} ,#{secretYn} ,#{description} ,#{sessionVo.userId} ,#{sessionVo.userId} ,SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
/* schedule.getScheduleList_BAK" */ WITH SCHEDULE AS ( SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID ,A.TITLE ,A.WORK_TYPE ,A.ALL_APPLY_YN ,B.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR ,B.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR ,A.SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE1 ,A.TIME_TYPE ,LPAD(A.START_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS START_TIME_HOUR ,A.START_TIME_MINUTE ,LPAD(A.END_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS END_TIME_HOUR ,A.END_TIME_MINUTE ,A.POSITION ,A.SECRET_YN ,A.DESCRIPTION ,A.USER_ID ,A.SP_CSTM_ID ,A.CONTRACT_ID ,(SELECT BUYER_NM FROM TBL_EXP_BUYER WHERE BUYER_ID = D.BUYER_ID) AS BUYER_NM ,(SELECT CONSULTING_NM FROM TBL_EXP_CONSULTING WHERE CONSULTING_ID = D.CONSULTING_ID) AS CONSULTING_NM ,C.LOOP_TYPE ,C.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,TO_CHAR(C.SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(C.SCHEDULE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE A JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) B ON 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_TYPE = B.CODE_ID JOIN TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_MASTER C ON 1 = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID = C.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_EXP_CONTRACT D ON 1 = 1 AND A.CONTRACT_ID = D.CONTRACT_ID WHERE 1 = 1
) SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,SP_CSTM_ID ,USER_ID ,TITLE ,SHARE_YN ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,WORK_COLOR ,TEXT_COLOR ,SCHEDULE_DATE ,SCHEDULE_DATE1 ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,LOOP_TYPE ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,CONTRACT_ID ,CONTRACT_NM FROM ( SELECT SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE.SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE.USER_ID ,SCHEDULE.TITLE ,'N' AS SHARE_YN ,SCHEDULE.WORK_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE.WORK_COLOR ,SCHEDULE.TEXT_COLOR ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE1 ,SCHEDULE.TIME_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.START_TIME_HOUR ,SCHEDULE.START_TIME_MINUTE ,SCHEDULE.END_TIME_HOUR ,SCHEDULE.END_TIME_MINUTE ,SCHEDULE.POSITION ,SCHEDULE.SECRET_YN ,SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION ,SCHEDULE.LOOP_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE.CONTRACT_ID ,SCHEDULE.BUYER_NM ||'/'||SCHEDULE.CONSULTING_NM AS CONTRACT_NM FROM SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCHEDULE.USER_ID = 'jonsaram' AND SCHEDULE.SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' UNION SELECT SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE.SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE.USER_ID ,'['||GET_USER_NM(SCHEDULE.USER_ID)||']'||SCHEDULE.TITLE AS TITLE ,'Y' AS SHARE_YN ,SCHEDULE.WORK_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE.WORK_COLOR ,SCHEDULE.TEXT_COLOR ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE1 ,SCHEDULE.TIME_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.START_TIME_HOUR ,SCHEDULE.START_TIME_MINUTE ,SCHEDULE.END_TIME_HOUR ,SCHEDULE.END_TIME_MINUTE ,SCHEDULE.POSITION ,SCHEDULE.SECRET_YN ,SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION ,SCHEDULE.LOOP_TYPE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE.CONTRACT_ID ,SCHEDULE.BUYER_NM ||'/'||SCHEDULE.CONSULTING_NM AS CONTRACT_NM FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE A JOIN SCHEDULE ON 1 = 1 AND SCHEDULE.SECRET_YN = 'Y' AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_ID AND SCHEDULE.SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND SCHEDULE.USER_ID != 'jonsaram' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND A.USER_ID = 'jonsaram' ) A ORDER BY SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE

/* schedule.getScheduleShareList */ SELECT A.SP_CSTM_ID ,A.USER_ID ,B.USER_NM ,A.SCHEDULE_ID ,B.DEL_YN ,B.E_MAIL ,B.GRADE ,B.PHONE_NUM ,B.SP_CSTM_ID ,B.STATE ,B.UPDATE_DATE ,B.UPDATE_USER ,B.USER_DESC ,B.USE_YN FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE A JOIN TBL_EXP_USER B ON 1 = 1 AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = B.SP_CSTM_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}

SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID ,SP_CSTM_ID ,CONTRACT_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID}

/* schedule.getNotRepeat */ WITH TABLE_DATE AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'YYYY-MM-DD') DTE ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'DAY') DAY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'DY') DY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'D') D FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{plusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ) SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID ,D.DTE AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,LPAD(A.START_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS START_TIME_HOUR ,A.START_TIME_MINUTE ,LPAD(A.END_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS END_TIME_HOUR ,A.END_TIME_MINUTE ,A.TITLE ,'N' AS SHARE_YN ,B.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR ,B.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE A JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) B ON 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_TYPE = B.CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_EXP_CONTRACT C ON 1 = 1 AND C.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID JOIN TABLE_DATE D ON 1 = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE = D.DTE WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} AND A.LOOP_TYPE = 'NOT_REPEAT' /*반복안함*/ UNION ALL SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID ,D.DTE AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,LPAD(A.START_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS START_TIME_HOUR ,A.START_TIME_MINUTE ,LPAD(A.END_TIME_HOUR , 2, '0') AS END_TIME_HOUR ,A.END_TIME_MINUTE ,A.TITLE ,'Y' AS SHARE_YN ,B.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR ,B.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE A JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) B ON 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_TYPE = B.CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_EXP_CONTRACT C ON 1 = 1 AND C.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID JOIN TABLE_DATE D ON 1 = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE = D.DTE JOIN TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE E ON 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = E.SP_CSTM_ID AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = E.SCHEDULE_ID AND E.USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.LOOP_TYPE = 'NOT_REPEAT'

/* schedule.getDayRepeat */ WITH TABLE_SCHEDULE AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE_STR ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND LOOP_TYPE = 'DAY' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) ,TABLE_DATE AS ( SELECT DTE ,DY ,D FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 + LEVEL , 'YYYY-MM-DD') DTE ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 + LEVEL , 'DAY') DAY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 + LEVEL , 'DY') DY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')-1 + LEVEL , 'D') D FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{plusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ORDER BY DTE ) SELECT A.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,A.START_TIME_HOUR ,A.START_TIME_MINUTE ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,A.END_TIME_HOUR ,A.END_TIME_MINUTE ,A.TITLE ,'N' AS SHARE_YN ,C.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR ,C.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_SCHEDULE A JOIN TABLE_DATE B ON 1 = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE_STR <= B.DTE JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) C ON 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_TYPE = C.CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} UNION ALL SELECT A.SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,A.START_TIME_HOUR ,A.START_TIME_MINUTE ,B.DTE AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,A.END_TIME_HOUR ,A.END_TIME_MINUTE ,A.TITLE ,'Y' AS SHARE_YN ,C.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR ,C.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_SCHEDULE A JOIN TABLE_DATE B ON 1 = 1 AND A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE_STR <= B.DTE JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) C ON 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_TYPE = C.CODE_ID JOIN TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE E ON 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = E.SP_CSTM_ID AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = E.SCHEDULE_ID AND E.USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId}

/* schedule.getWeekRepeat */ WITH BASE_TABEL AS( SELECT DTE ,DY ,D FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'YYYY-MM-DD') DTE ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'DAY') DAY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'DY') DY ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL , 'D') D FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{plusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{minusDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ORDER BY DTE ), TABLE_SCHEDULE AS ( SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE, 'd') AS WEEK_START ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_END_DATE, 'd') AS WEEK_END FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND LOOP_TYPE = 'WEEK' ), TABLE_SCHEDULE_SHARE AS ( SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE, 'd') AS WEEK_START ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE, 'd') AS WEEK_END FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE A JOIN TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE_SHARE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.USER_ID = #{sessionVo.userId} AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = B.SP_CSTM_ID AND A.SCHEDULE_ID = B.SCHEDULE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.LOOP_TYPE = 'WEEK' ) SELECT A.GROUP_ID , SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, 1, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#') - 1) AS SCHEDULE_ID , SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 2) - INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 1) - 1) AS SCHEDULE_DATE , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 2) - INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 1) - 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + (TO_NUMBER( SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 3) + 1)) * 7)-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE , B.START_TIME_HOUR , B.START_TIME_MINUTE , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 2) + 1, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 3) - INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 2) - 1) , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') + (TO_NUMBER( SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#', 1, 3) + 1)) * 7)-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE , B.END_TIME_HOUR , B.END_TIME_MINUTE , B.TITLE , A.SHARE_YN AS SHARE_YN , C.ATTR1 AS WORK_COLOR , C.ATTR2 AS TEXT_COLOR FROM (
SELECT A.GROUP_ID ,'N' AS SHARE_YN ,MAX(A.DY_START) AS DY_START ,MAX(A.D_START) AS D_START ,MAX(A.DY_END) AS DY_END ,MAX(A.D_END) AS D_END FROM ( /*======= 사용자 일정 사용자 일정 사용자 일정 =======*/ SELECT A.GROUP_ID||'#'||A.GRP_CNT AS GROUP_ID ,A.DY_START ,A.D_START ,A.DY_END ,A.D_END FROM (
SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE AS GROUP_ID ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ORDER BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE) AS GRP_CNT ,BASE_TABEL.DY AS DY_START ,BASE_TABEL.D AS D_START ,NULL AS DY_END ,NULL AS D_END FROM BASE_TABEL ,TABLE_SCHEDULE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_TABEL.D = A.WEEK_START ) A UNION ALL SELECT A.GROUP_ID||'#'||A.GRP_CNT AS GROUP_ID ,A.DY_START ,A.D_START ,A.DY_END ,A.D_END FROM (
SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE AS GROUP_ID ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ORDER BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE) AS GRP_CNT ,NULL AS DY_START ,NULL AS D_START ,BASE_TABEL.DY AS DY_END ,BASE_TABEL.D AS D_END FROM BASE_TABEL ,TABLE_SCHEDULE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_TABEL.D = A.WEEK_END ) A /*####### 사용자 일정 사용자 일정 사용자 일정 #######*/ ) A GROUP BY A.GROUP_ID UNION ALL SELECT A.GROUP_ID ,'Y' AS SHARE_YN ,MAX(A.DY_START) AS DY_START ,MAX(A.D_START) AS D_START ,MAX(A.DY_END) AS DY_END ,MAX(A.D_END) AS D_END FROM ( /*======= 공유된 일정 공유된 일정 공유된 일정 =======*/ SELECT A.GROUP_ID||'#'||A.GRP_CNT AS GROUP_ID ,A.DY_START ,A.D_START ,A.DY_END ,A.D_END FROM (
SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE AS GROUP_ID ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ORDER BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE) AS GRP_CNT ,BASE_TABEL.DY AS DY_START ,BASE_TABEL.D AS D_START ,NULL AS DY_END ,NULL AS D_END FROM BASE_TABEL ,TABLE_SCHEDULE_SHARE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_TABEL.D = A.WEEK_START ) A UNION ALL SELECT A.GROUP_ID||'#'||A.GRP_CNT AS GROUP_ID ,A.DY_START ,A.D_START ,A.DY_END ,A.D_END FROM (
SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE AS GROUP_ID ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE ORDER BY A.SCHEDULE_ID||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_START_DATE||'#'||A.SCHEDULE_END_DATE) AS GRP_CNT ,NULL AS DY_START ,NULL AS D_START ,BASE_TABEL.DY AS DY_END ,BASE_TABEL.D AS D_END FROM BASE_TABEL ,TABLE_SCHEDULE_SHARE A WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_TABEL.D = A.WEEK_END ) A /*======= 공유된 일정 공유된 일정 공유된 일정 =======*/ ) A GROUP BY A.GROUP_ID ) A JOIN TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.LOOP_TYPE = 'WEEK' AND SUBSTR(A.GROUP_ID, 1, INSTR(A.GROUP_ID, '#') - 1) = B.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_CODE_ID ,B.CODE_ID ,B.ATTR1 ,B.ATTR2 FROM TBL_EXP_GRPCODE A JOIN TBL_EXP_CODE B ON 1 = 1 AND B.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = B.GRP_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SP_CSTM_ID = #{sessionVo.spCstmId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.GRP_CODE_ID = 'SCHEDULE_WORK_TYPE' ) C ON 1 = 1 AND B.WORK_TYPE = C.CODE_ID

/* schedule.getMonthRepeat */ WITH TABLE_END_DAY AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'MONTH' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'END_OF_MONTH' ) ,TABLE_SELECT_DAY AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'MONTH' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'SELECT_DAY' ) ,TABLE_BASE AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9, 2) AS SCHEDULE_START_DAY ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'MONTH' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD IS NULL ) SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_END_DAY UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_SELECT_DAY UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_BASE

/* schedule.getQuarterRepeat */ WITH TABLE_END_DAY AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER1 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 3),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER2 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 6),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER3 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER4 ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'QUARTER' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'END_OF_MONTH' ) ,TABLE_SELECT_DAY AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER1 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 3),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER2 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 6),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER3 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER4 ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'QUARTER' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'SELECT_DAY' ) ,TABLE_BASE AS ( SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 0),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER1 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 3),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER2 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 6),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER3 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9),'YYYY-MM-DD'),6,2) AS QUARTER4 ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9, 2) AS SCHEDULE_START_DAY ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'QUARTER' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD IS NULL ) SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_END_DAY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( QUARTER1 = #{month} OR QUARTER2 = #{month} OR QUARTER3 = #{month} OR QUARTER4 = #{month}) UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_SELECT_DAY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( QUARTER1 = #{month} OR QUARTER2 = #{month} OR QUARTER3 = #{month} OR QUARTER4 = #{month}) UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-05-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-05-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_BASE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( QUARTER1 = #{month} OR QUARTER2 = #{month} OR QUARTER3 = #{month} OR QUARTER4 = #{month})

/* schedule.getYearRepeat */ WITH TABLE_END_DAY AS ( /*월의 마지막일 - 월의 마지막일*/ SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'YEAR' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'END_OF_MONTH' ) ,TABLE_SELECT_DAY AS ( /*월의 마지막일 - 선택일*/ SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'YEAR' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD = 'SELECT_DAY' ) ,TABLE_BASE AS ( /*월의 일반일*/ SELECT SP_CSTM_ID ,SCHEDULE_ID ,SCHEDULE_GRP_ID ,LOOP_TYPE ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD ,LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL ,SCHEDULE_LOOP_END_DATE ,TITLE ,WORK_TYPE ,ALL_APPLY_YN ,SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 9, 2) AS SCHEDULE_START_DAY ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,SCHEDULE_END_DATE- SCHEDULE_START_DATE AS DATE_DIFFER ,TIME_TYPE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,CONTRACT_ID ,POSITION ,SECRET_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,USER_ID FROM TBL_EXP_SCHEDULE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SP_CSTM_ID = 'starasset' AND LOOP_TYPE = 'YEAR' AND LOOP_TYPE_DTL_CD IS NULL ) SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_END_DAY UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-06-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE /* 2022-05-01은 화면에서 받아온다*/ ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-06-'||LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE /* 날짜 더하기*/ ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_SELECT_DAY WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = LOOP_TYPE_DTL_VAL UNION ALL SELECT SCHEDULE_ID ,TITLE ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-06-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_START_DATE ,START_TIME_HOUR ,START_TIME_MINUTE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('2024-06-'||SCHEDULE_START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + DATE_DIFFER, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULE_END_DATE ,END_TIME_HOUR ,END_TIME_MINUTE ,'#EE7C7C' AS WORK_COLOR ,'' AS TEXT_COLOR FROM TABLE_BASE
